alert.note: Alert for Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 2:52PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Palm Beach County through 315 PM EDT... At 252 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud over The Acreage, or near West Palm Beach, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Wellington, Palm Beach Gardens, Riviera Beach, Greenacres, Royal Palm Beach, Palm Springs, Haverhill, Palm Beach International Airport, Golden Lakes, Loxahatchee Groves, Gun Club Estates, Schall Circle, Royal Palm Estates, Lake Belvedere Estates, The Acreage, Lake Clarke Shores, Glen Ridge, Lakeside Green and Plantation Mobile Home Park. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
